Package it.polimi.ingsw.controllers

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controllers.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class Controller extends Object implements Observer
This is the main controller of the game rules in the server. It implements Observer
